birth_place.zh-cn: 法属印度支那广治省肇丰县
birth_place.en: Triệu Phong District, Quảng Trị Province, French Indochina

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党、越南民主共和国和越南社会主义共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。在胡志明去世后，他成为北越的最高领导人，并主导了越南的统一。其亲苏反华的立场导致了中越关系的紧张。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. After Ho Chi Minh's death, he became the paramount leader of North Vietnam and led the country's reunification. His pro-Soviet and anti-Chinese stance led to tense Sino-Vietnamese relations.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党和越南民主共和国的缔造者和主要领导人，曾任越南劳动党中央委员会主席。黎笋在其之下担任第二位领导人。
description.en: Founder and key leader of the Communist Party of Vietnam and the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam. Lê Duẩn served as the second-in-command under him.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党和越南社会主义共和国的主要领导人之一，在黎笋去世后接替其担任越共中央总书记。
description.en: A key leader of the Communist Party of Vietnam and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, who succeeded Lê Duẩn as General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam Central Committee after his death.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋与黎氏霜之子，曾任越南人民军上校。
description.en: Son of Lê Duẩn and Lê Thị Sương, a former colonel in the Vietnam People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋与阮瑞娥之子，商人。
description.en: Son of Lê Duẩn and Nguyễn Thụy Nga, a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋与阮瑞娥之子，越南公安部少将。
description.en: Son of Lê Duẩn and Nguyễn Thụy Nga, a Major General in the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南的执政党，由越南劳动党于1976年改名而来。
description.en: The ruling party of Vietnam, renamed from the Workers' Party of Vietnam in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的前身，在1951年至1976年间是北越的执政党。
description.en: The predecessor of the Communist Party of Vietnam, and the ruling party of North Vietnam from 1951 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的前身之一，成立于1930年，黎笋是其早期党员。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Communist Party of Vietnam, founded in 1930, of which Lê Duẩn was an early member.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代的越南革命组织，黎笋于1928年加入。
description.en: A Vietnamese revolutionary organization in the 1920s, which Lê Duẩn joined in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 即北越，越南统一前位于北方的社会主义国家，黎笋是其主要领导人之一。
description.en: Also known as North Vietnam, a socialist state in the northern part of Vietnam before reunification. Lê Duẩn was one of its key leaders.

description.zh-cn: 1976年南北统一后的越南国名，黎笋是其主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: The official name of Vietnam after the reunification of North and South in 1976. Lê Duẩn was one of its main founders and leaders.

description.zh-cn: 即南越，越南统一前位于南方的资本主义国家，后被越南民主共和国并入。
description.en: Also known as South Vietnam, a capitalist state in the southern part of Vietnam before reunification, which was later incorporated into the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 法国在东南亚的殖民地联邦，其殖民当局曾两次逮捕黎笋。
description.en: A colonial federation of France in Southeast Asia, whose colonial authorities arrested Lê Duẩn twice.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的共产主义超级大国，在黎笋执政期间是越南的主要支持者。
description.en: A communist superpower of the 20th century, which was a key supporter of Vietnam during Lê Duẩn's rule.

description.zh-cn: 在黎笋执政期间，因其亲苏立场、排华政策及领土争端，与越南关系紧张。
description.en: During Lê Duẩn's rule, its relationship with Vietnam was tense due to his pro-Soviet stance, anti-Chinese policies, and territorial disputes.

description.zh-cn: 越南中北沿海地区的一个省，是黎笋的出生地。
description.en: A province in the North Central Coast region of Vietnam, and the birthplace of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的首都，黎笋的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, and the place of Lê Duẩn's death.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋于1978年下令越南军队入侵柬埔寨而引发的战争。
description.en: A war triggered by Lê Duẩn's order for Vietnamese troops to invade Cambodia in 1978.

nodes.id: 越南共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的最高权力机构，黎笋曾担任其总书记。
description.en: The highest authority of the Communist Party of Vietnam, where Lê Duẩn served as General Secretary.

nodes.id: 越南劳动党中央委员会

zh-cn: 越南劳动党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南劳动党的最高权力机构，黎笋曾担任其第一书记。
description.en: The highest authority of the Workers' Party of Vietnam, where Lê Duẩn served as First Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 越南劳动党在越南南部的领导机构，黎笋曾任其书记。
description.en: The leadership body of the Workers' Party of Vietnam in South Vietnam, where Lê Duẩn served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1936年至1938年间统治法国的左翼联盟。其政府对印度支那政治犯的特赦政策使黎笋得以获释。
description.en: A left-wing coalition that governed France from 1936 to 1938. Its government's amnesty policy for political prisoners in Indochina led to Lê Duẩn's release.

relationships.target: 越南劳动党中央委员会
越南共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 在胡志明担任越南劳动党中央委员会主席期间，黎笋担任第一书记，是其之下的二号领导人。
description.en: While Ho Chi Minh was Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam, Lê Duẩn served as First Secretary, making him the second-in-command.

description.zh-cn: 长征在黎笋去世后接替其担任越共中央总书记。
description.en: Trường Chinh succeeded Lê Duẩn as General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam Central Committee after his death.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋下令越南军队入侵柬埔寨，引发了柬越战争。
description.en: Lê Duẩn ordered the Vietnamese army to invade Cambodia, which triggered the Cambodian-Vietnamese War.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在位期间采取亲近苏联的立场。
description.en: During his time in power, Lê Duẩn adopted a pro-Soviet stance.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在位期间，由于其亲苏立场、排华运动和领土主张，与中国的关系十分紧张。
description.en: During Lê Duẩn's rule, his relationship with China was extremely tense due to his pro-Soviet stance, anti-Chinese campaigns, and territorial claims.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋于1931年底被法国殖民当局逮捕并判刑20年，后于1936年获释。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was arrested by French colonial authorities in late 1931 and sentenced to 20 years in prison, and was released in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋于1940年再次被捕，并被判处10年监禁。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was arrested again in 1940 and sentenced to 10 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 法国人民战线政府实行对印度支那政治犯的特赦政策，使黎笋获释。
description.en: The Popular Front government's amnesty policy for political prisoners in Indochina led to Lê Duẩn's release from his first imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 1976年12月，越南劳动党第四次全国代表大会决定改名为越南共产党。
description.en: In December 1976, the 4th National Congress of the Workers' Party of Vietnam decided to rename the party to the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 在黎笋的领导下，越南民主共和国（北越）统一了越南共和国（南越）。
description.en: Under the leadership of Lê Duẩn, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) unified the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam).
